Uses of Class
org.forgerock.openam.rest.Routers.ResourceRoute

  • Packages that use Routers.ResourceRoute 
    Package Description
    org.forgerock.openam.rest
    This package contains classes for all the REST framework classes responsible for determining the location of request REST endpoints.

    • Uses of Routers.ResourceRoute in org.forgerock.openam.rest

      Methods in org.forgerock.openam.rest that return Routers.ResourceRoute 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Routers.ResourceRoute Routers.ResourceRoute.auditAs(AuditConstants.Component component)
      Specifies the audit component to use when auditing requests to the endpoint.
      Routers.ResourceRoute Routers.ResourceRoute.auditAs(AuditConstants.Component component, Class<? extends org.forgerock.json.resource.Filter> filterClass)
      Specifies the audit component to use when auditing requests to the endpoint.
      Routers.ResourceRoute Routers.ResourceRoute.authenticateWith(org.forgerock.json.resource.Filter authenticationFilter)
      Specifies the authentication filter to be used to protected the endpoint.
      Routers.ResourceRoute Routers.ResourceRoute.authorizeWith(Class<? extends org.forgerock.authz.filter.crest.api.CrestAuthorizationModule>... authorizationModules)
      Specifies the authorization modules to use when authorizing requests to the endpoint.
      Routers.ResourceRoute Routers.ResourceRoute.authorizeWith(com.google.inject.Key<? extends org.forgerock.authz.filter.crest.api.CrestAuthorizationModule>... authorizationModuleKeys)
      Specifies the authorization modules to use when authorizing requests to the endpoint.
      Routers.ResourceRoute ResourceRouter.route(String uriTemplate)
      Starts the fluent route builder.
      Routers.ResourceRoute Routers.ResourceRoute.through(Class<? extends org.forgerock.json.resource.Filter>... filters)
      Specifies filters that the request must pass through before reaching the endpoint.
